# Security Policy

## Supported Versions

| Version | Supported          |
| ------- | ------------------ |
| 1.0.0   | :white_check_mark: |

## Supported Node Versions

| Version | Supported          |
| ------- | ------------------ |
| 18      | :white_check_mark: |
| 16      | :white_check_mark: |
| 14      | :white_check_mark: |
| < 12    | :x:                |

## Reporting a Vulnerability

To report a Vulnerability open a issue on Github.
